title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 33.1 - Form of statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 33.1 - Form of statement

State Regulations

The debt statement form to be used in connection with
public sales of bonds by school districts under the provisions of section
109.00
of
the Local Finance Law and title 10 of article 2 of the Local Finance Law shall
be in the form shown at Exhibit attached hereto[FN*] and hereby made a part
hereof, as fully as if herein set forth. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
33.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
